languages.text: "Подавление малых культов нанесло по ним сильный удар. Вернув паству в верное стойло, мы обеспечили им меньший приток новобранцев, чем они могли бы заполучить".
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
languages.original_text: "Подавление малых культов нанесло по ним сильный удар. Вернув паству в верное стойло, мы обеспечили им меньший приток новобранцев, чем они могли бы заполучить".

traits.locale_text: "The suppression of the minor cults have been a huge blow for them. By returning the flock to the loyal stable, we have cut down their possible amount of new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults have been a huge blow for them. By returning the flock to the loyal stable, we have cut down their possible amount of new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By returning the flock to a loyal stable, we have cut down the possible amount of their new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."
"The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

languages.text: “之前在镇压小型教派时，我们给他们造成了沉重的打击。我们成功将牧群带回了忠诚的牧人手中，减少了他们新成员的数量。”
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

traits.locale_text: “之前在镇压小型教派时，我们给他们造成了沉重的打击。我们成功将牧群带回了忠诚的牧人手中，减少了他们新成员的数量。”

languages.text: «La supresión de los cultos menores es un revés considerable para ellos. Al volver al redil de la obediencia, hemos reducido sus posibles nuevos reclutas».
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

traits.locale_text: «La supresión de los cultos menores es un revés considerable para ellos. Al volver al redil de la obediencia, hemos reducido sus posibles nuevos reclutas».

languages.text: 「奴らは小さなカルトの弾圧により痛手を被った。群れを忠実な厩舎に戻すことで、奴らの新たな仲間の数を減らすことができた」
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

traits.locale_text: 「奴らは魔女団の少数派の弾圧により痛手を被った。群れを忠実な厩舎に戻すことで、奴らの新たな仲間の数を減らすことができた」

languages.text: « L'éradication des cultes mineurs leur a infligé un terrible coup. En renvoyant ce troupeau vers une étable qui nous est fidèle, nous avons réduit le nombre de leurs futures recrues. »
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

traits.locale_text: « L'éradication des cultes mineurs leur a infligé un terrible coup. En renvoyant ce troupeau vers une étable qui nous est fidèle, nous avons réduit le nombre de leurs futures recrues. »

languages.text: "Durch die Unterdrückung der niederen Kulte haben wir ihnen einen schweren Schlag versetzt. Indem wir die Herde in den Schoß des Gehorsams zurücktrieben, haben wir die Zahl potenzieller neuer Rekruten reduziert."
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

traits.locale_text: "Durch die Unterdrückung der niederen Kulte haben wir ihnen einen schweren Schlag versetzt. Indem wir die Herde in den Schoß des Gehorsams zurücktrieben, haben wir die Zahl potenzieller neuer Rekruten reduziert."

languages.text: "Ufak çaplı tarikatların sindirilmesi, onlara ağır bir darbe indirdi. Cemaat mensuplarını sadakat safına çekerek aralarına katılması muhtemel şahısların sayısını da azalttık."
languages.original_text: "The suppression of the minor cults dealt them a harsh blow. By bringing the flock back into the fold of obedience, we have reduced the number of potential new recruits."

traits.locale_text: "Ufak çaplı tarikatların sindirilmesi, onlara ağır bir darbe indirdi. Cemaat mensuplarını sadakat safına çekerek aralarına katılması muhtemel şahısların sayısını da azalttık."
